# Draft:Reconquest of Dhara

}}
| result            = Paramara victory
| territory         = Paramaras reconquer Dhara
| combatant1        = Chaulukya dynasty
| combatant2        = Paramaras
| commander1        = Senapati Kumara
| commander2        = Maharajadhiraja VindhyavarmanYuvraj Subhatavarman (Possibly)
| strength1         =

| conflict          = Reconquest of Dhara
}}
The Reconquest of Dhara was a military action by Vindhyavarman of the Paramara dynasty against the Chaulukya dynasty and it saw the end of Chaulukya domination over Malwa and the restoration & stabilization of the Paramara dynasty.
